 2 bedroom flat for rent in block 7, 12 street  Vazha Pshavela , 100 yards from Monument of Vazha Pshavela. Studio type  newly renovated, very clean, 100 yards from business center , pubs, restaurants, cafes, post office,banks etc Buses every 10mins to any direction, min 6mths let with 2 mth deposit no smokers, no pets, no housing benefit.
Available from 1st of July for $500.00 per month, Tengo, 593 941588.
